Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 -- 1.18 Mills Red. & Ext. - PJ - 4 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall one-half of the proceeds of the one and eighteen hundredths (1.18) mills property tax heretofore collected and not expended and hereinafter collected, which is presently authorized to be levied by the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), through the year 2022 for Public Health Unit purposes pursuant to an election held on April 30, 2011 (an estimated $131,652 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), be rededicated for the purpose of supporting the general fund and shall the Parish be further authorized to extend the levy of said 1.18 mills property tax for an additional period of four (4) years through the year 2026?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 -- 9.03 Mills Red. & Ext. - PJ - 8 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the proceeds of the nine and three hundredths (9.03) mills property tax heretofore collected and not expended and hereinafter collected, which is presently authorized to be levied by the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), through the year 2018 for Courthouse and Jail and Solid Waste purposes pursuant to an election held on July 19, 2008 (an estimated $1,003,748 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), be rededicated such that the proceeds will be allocated as follows: 50% for providing and maintaining garbage collection and disposal services and 50% for constructing, improving, equipping, operating and maintaining public works and roads of the Parish, and shall the Parish be further authorized to extend the levy of said 9.03 mills property tax for an additional period of eight (8) years through the year 2026?
